item.title: Shut up Spotify!
item.description: Shut up Spotify! Apart from when I’m forced to work from home I have generally worked in open plan offices. One of my big fears each day is that I will open my laptop and whatever embarrassing song I was listening to will immediately start playing on full volume for everyone to hear. Recently I bought a new pair of bluetooth headphones that conveniently allow you to connect to multiple devices at once.
